Sentencas: Single-component electrolyte-free fuel cells possess a similar function to the traditional fuel cells with a complex three-component structure.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity optimization in electrolyte-free fuel cells by single-component Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 layer

Sentencas: However, how to enhance their electrical properties for practical industrial applications remains a timely and important issue.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity optimization in electrolyte-free fuel cells by single-component Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 layer

Sentencas: Here, we report the manipulation of concentration ratios of ionic to electronic conductors in an electrolyte-free Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 by adjusting the relative weight between its two inside compositions.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity optimization in electrolyte-free fuel cells by single-component Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 layer

Sentencas: Our systematic investigations reveal that the fuel cell with 30% in weight of Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 exhibits an almost uniform distribution of the two compositions and has a total conductivity as high as 10 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Electrical conductivity optimization in electrolyte-free fuel cells by single-component Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 layer
Electrical conductivity optimization in electrolyte-free fuel cells by single-component Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 layer

Sentencas: Such an enhancement is found to be attributed to the established balance between the numbers of its inside ionic and electronic conductors.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity optimization in electrolyte-free fuel cells by single-component Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 layer

Sentencas: These findings are relevant for the technological improvement of this new species of electrolyte-free fuel cell and represent an important step toward commercialization of this single-component fuel cell.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity optimization in electrolyte-free fuel cells by single-component Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-δ-Li0.15Ni0.45Zn0.4 layer
